src:
No comparto punto de vista de Sicilia, está en su derecho de manifestarse: AMLO | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / AL



El presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador dijo que Javier Sicilia está en su derecho de criticar la estrategia de seguridad que aplica su gobierno, aunque no comparte su punto de vista. Sostuvo que tiene su derecho a tener una visión distinta y a manifestarse por el país si así lo considera necesario.
text:
I do not share a view of Sicily, it is your right to express yourself: AMLO | Find out
 by AN / AL Writing



President Andrés Manuel López Obrador said that Javier Sicilia is entitled to criticize the security strategy applied by his government, although he does not share his point of view. He said he has his right to have a different vision and to express himself in the country if he considers it necessary.
